mapper.select: SELECT CO_CD, emp_ID, emp_PS, emp_EMAIL, emp_TEL, emp_NAME, emp_SX, emp_CD, emp_OD, emp_AUTH FROM EMP WHERE emp_ID = #{empId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMP (emp_ID, emp_NAME, emp_PS, emp_EMAIL, emp_SX, emp_TEL, CO_CD, emp_OD) VALUES (#{empId}, #{empName}, #{empPs}, #{empEmail}, #{empSx}, #{empTel}, #{coCd}, #{empOd});
mapper.update: UPDATE EMP SET D_PS = #{dPs}, D_EMAIL = #{dEmail}, D_TEL = #{dTel}, D_NAME = #{dName}, D_BDAY = #{dBday}, D_ADR = #{dAdr}, D_ZP = #{dZp}, D_SX = #{dSx}, D_BCD = #{dBcd}, D_CD = #{dCd}, D_OD = #{dOd} WHERE D_ID = #{dId}
